title: Will Trump's focus on Venezuela hurt him on the economy?
shortDescription: President Trump's focus on Venezuela's and push to expand America's reach steers him further from America's top concern: the economy.

title: Would US use force to take Greenland? White House says it's 'always an option'
shortDescription: The Trump administration has reignited threats against the Danish territory and refused to rule out military force, according to a White House statement.

title: Trump freezes $10B in child care, family funds in 5 states. See where.
shortDescription: The Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) is freezing the funds citing what it called concerns about fraud and misuse.

title: Trump says Venezuela to provide up to 50 million barrels of oil to US
shortDescription: "This Oil will be sold at its Market Price, and that money will be controlled by me, as President of the United States of America," Trump said.

title: Trumps says his wife does not like him dancing
shortDescription: President Trump says First Lady Melania is not a fan of his dancing and mimicry, allegedly calling it "unpresidential."

title: Kelly vows to fight for First Amendment amid Pentagon threats
shortDescription: Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth announced Kelly's censure on Jan. 5, months after the lawmaker said service members 'can refuse illegal orders.'

title: Trump tries to reshape J6 narrative as Dems issue anniversary warning
shortDescription: The five-year anniversary of the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot saw the Trump White House and Democrats battle over the narrative around the event.

title: Trump's Energy chief to meet with oil executives this week
shortDescription: Energy Secretary Chris Wright will meet with oil executives at a conference on Wednesday.

title: Departures and a tragedy shrink Trump's GOP majority
shortDescription: President Trump's GOP majority in the House is shrinking with the resignation of Marjorie Taylor Greene and sudden death of Doug LaMalfa.

title: Doug LaMalfa dead at 65: Donald Trump remembers Congressman
shortDescription: Trump called the longtime Republican representative a "fantastic person."

title: Trump says we will 'worry about' Greenland in 2 months after Venezuela
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has repeatedly said he wants to take Greenland, which has received extra weight after the capture of Maduro in Venezuela. Why?

title: Who was Doug LaMalfa? What to know about GOP lawmaker.
shortDescription: Here's what to know about Doug LaMalfa, the GOP lawmaker from Northern California who died at age 65 following a medical emergency.

title: Trump defends mimicry, dancing when wife calls moves 'unpresidential'
shortDescription: Trump confided to House Republicans that first lady Melania Trump discouraged him from mimicking others during speeches or dancing as 'unpresidential'

title: Trump visited golf club 12 days over the holidays. Who played with him?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was in Palm Beach for the holidays, and he made nearly daily visits to his golf club nearby. What we know about his golfing.

title: January 6 defendants march in DC on fifth anniversary of Capitol riot
shortDescription: Former Proud Boys leader Enrique Tarrio and other Jan. 6 defendants pardoned by President Trump march in DC on the fifth anniversary of Capitol riot.

title: Trump urges House GOP to win midterms to avoid third impeachment
shortDescription: Trump warned Republicans if they lose control of the House in the midterm elections, Democrats could impeach him again.

title: Jan. 6 defendants marched to Capitol to memorialize Ashli Babbitt
shortDescription: Led by the former Proud Boys leader, a "memorial march" to remember those who died as a result of the attack was held on Tuesday.

title: Trump calls himself 'king' at Republican speech
shortDescription: In a long speech at the House Republicans retreat on January 6th, the president called himself 'king' and mentioned re-election twice.

title: Machado to 'Hannity:' Trump deserve Peace Prize
shortDescription: Maria Corina Machado says Trump earned Nobel Peace Prize in an Fox News interview with Sean Hannity and vows to return to Venezuela soon.

title: Indiana Congressman Jim Baird hospitalized after car crash
shortDescription: Baird, who represents Indiana's 4th Congressional District, is reportedly in a stable condition.

title: See Republican Congressman Doug LaMalfa's career in politics
shortDescription: Republican U.S. Rep. Doug LaMalfa of California has died, lawmakers confirmed on Jan. 6, 2026.
